name: Quietus (Martyn, MrCritters)
description:
You are the last surviving human of your fleet, all other life as you know is gone. On your search throughout the galaxy for any signs of life, your radar goes off.

The emergency lights turn on, and you see hundreds of unknown entities heading straight toward you. You're not sure what they are, but you do know one thing.

You activate your lasers, you ignite your boosters. This is it. This is the last stand.

Embrace Quietus. Hell is here.

Quietus is a 2.5D arcade shooter set in space. This was a student project designed as a spiritual successor to Digital Devolver's Luftrausers. Developed over 12 weeks, Quietus has a variety of features:

  • Unforgiving Gameplay
  • A Variety of Missions
  • Ship Customisation
  • And More...

Martyn Evans

Joshua Christie
